mapper.select: select uid from icbc_erp_token where accid=#{0}
select id,name from assess_fs
mapper.insert:
insert into occupy_test
icbc_id,
data_time,
result,
describe_,
#{icbcId},
#{dataTime},
#{result},
#{describe},
mapper.select: select id,name from icbc_banklist
mapper.update: update icbc_erp_video_info set server_path=#{serverPath} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select bank_id from kj_icbc where id=#{0}
select count(*) from assess_admin where id=#{0}
mapper.insert:
insert into icbc_erp_token
token,
accid,
employcode,
uid,
parentid,
mid_add,
mid_edit,
dt_add,
dt_edit,
delmark,
bank_id,
#{token},
#{accid},
#{employcode},
#{uid},
#{parentid},
#{mid_add},
#{mid_edit},

#{dt_edit},
#{delmark},

mapper.select:
select token,accid,employcode from icbc_erp_token where employcode=#{code}
limit 0,${size}
select delmark from icbc_erp_token where uid=#{0}
select a.bank_id bankId,a.id mark,a.delmark,a.accid auditAccid ,a.token auditToken,b.accid clientAccid,b.token clientToken from icbc_erp_token a,icbc_erp_token b where a.id=b.parentid and a.uid=#{0}
select ievw.index,concat('http://a.kcway.net/assess/',videourl) videourl,text from icbc_erp_videorec_wt ievw
select id from icbc_erp_video_info where channelId=#{0}
mapper.update: update icbc_erp_video_info set result_id=#{id} where channelId=#{channel}
update icbc_erp_video_info set address=#{address},result_id=#{id} where channelId=#{channel}
mapper.insert: insert into icbc_erp_video_info( channelId, createtime, duration, faccid, ext, address, viedotype, duration_time) VALUES( #{channelId}, #{createtime}, #{duration}, #{faccid}, #{ext.id}, #{ext.address}, #{viedotype}, #{duration_time})
insert into icbc_erp_video_info( url, channelid, viedotype, download_info, vid) values( #{url}, #{channelid}, #{viedotype}, #{download_info}, #{vid} )
mapper.select: select channelId from icbc_erp_video_info where channelId=#{0}
select url,vid from icbc_erp_video_info where id=#{0}
select count(*) from icbc_banklist where id=#{0}

select * from (select
kik.cars_type,kik.kp_price,kik.dk_price,kik.jrfw_price,kik.dk_total_price,kik.aj_type,kik.aj_date,kik.aj_bank,kik.dk_lv, kik.dz_type,kik.sp_address,kik.yw_address,kik.kk_car_stateid,kik.kk_car_cityid,kik.kk_loan_stateid,kik.kk_loan_cityid,kik.kk_kh, kik.sfje,kik.po_ysr,kik.po_xl,kik.po_xzdz,kik.po_yzbm,kik.po_gzdw,kik.po_dwdz,kik.po_zw,kik.jjlxr_c_name,kik.jjlxr_c_tel,kik.jjlxr_jdrgx, kik.jjlxr_xzdz,kik.zdr_hyzk,kik.zdr_grsr,kik.zdr_jtsr,kik.zdr_xl,kik.zdr_jzzk,kik.zdr_xzdz,kik.zdr_yzbm,kik.zdr_gzdw,kik.zdr_dwdh,kik.zdr_dwdz, kik.zdr_dwxz,kik.zdr_sshy,kik.zdr_zy,kik.zdr_zw,kik.zdr_gznx,kik.gjr1_hyzk,kik.gjr2_hyzk,kik.gjr1_xzdz,kik.gjr2_xzdz,kik.gjr1_yzbm,kik.gjr2_yzbm, kik.gjr1_gzdw,kik.gjr2_gzdw,kik.gjr1_dwdz,kik.gjr2_dwdz,kik.gjr1_yzdrgx,kik.gjr2_yzdrgx,kik.zdr_wsdz,kik.po_wsdz,kik.gjr1_wsdz,kik.gjr2_wsdz, kik.qtlxr_c_name,kik.qtlxr_c_tel,kik.qtlxr_jdrgx,kik.qtlxr_xzdz, ki.id,ki.c_name,ki.c_tel,ki.c_cardno,ki.gems_fs_id,ki.gems_id,ki.loan_tpid, ki.loan_level,ki.c_name_mt,ki.c_tel_mt,ki.c_cardno_mt,ki.kk_kpj,ki.c_sex,ki.c_name_gj1,ki.c_name_gj2,ki.c_tel_gj1,ki.c_tel_gj2,ki.c_cardno_gj1,ki.c_cardno_gj2,ki.imgstep2_1ss,ki.id icbcid, ac.price_result,ac.source_id,ac.property_id,ac.car_status,ac.gear_box_id,ac.car_km_icbc,ac.cardt2,ac.cardt1,ac.color_id,ac.mem_states,ac.mem_citys,ac.vincode,ac.ppxh,ac.motorcode,ac.icbc_pricecs,ac.price_new,ac.c_carno, yb.id ybId,yb.`name` ybName, cb.name cbName,cm.name cmName,cs.name csName,ag.name agName,af.name afName from kj_icbc ki left JOIN assess_cars ac on ki.id =ac.icbc_id left JOIN icbc_banklist yb on yb.id=ki.bank_id left JOIN car_brand cb on cb.id=ac.brid left JOIN car_model cm on cm.id=ac.carid left JOIN car_series cs on cs.id=ac.seid left JOIN assess_gems ag on ag.id=ki.gems_id left JOIN assess_fs af on af.id=ki.gems_fs_id left JOIN kjs_icbc_kk kik on ki.id=kik.icbc_id) a where a.icbcid=#{0}
select concat('http://a.kcway.net/assess/',kim.imgurl_sfzyz) visa,kim.api_result2 man from kjs_icbc_mq kim where icbc_id=#{0} order by id desc

select kik.cars_type,kik.kp_price,kik.dk_price,kik.jrfw_price,kik.dk_total_price,kik.aj_type,kik.aj_date,kik.aj_bank,kik.dk_lv, kik.dz_type,kik.sp_address,kik.yw_address,kik.kk_car_stateid,kik.kk_car_cityid,kik.kk_loan_stateid,kik.kk_loan_cityid,kik.kk_kh, kik.sfje,kik.po_ysr,kik.po_xl,kik.po_xzdz,kik.po_yzbm,kik.po_gzdw,kik.po_dwdz,kik.po_zw,kik.jjlxr_c_name,kik.jjlxr_c_tel,kik.jjlxr_jdrgx, kik.jjlxr_xzdz,kik.zdr_hyzk,kik.zdr_grsr,kik.zdr_jtsr,kik.zdr_xl,kik.zdr_jzzk,kik.zdr_xzdz,kik.zdr_yzbm,kik.zdr_gzdw,kik.zdr_dwdh,kik.zdr_dwdz, kik.zdr_dwxz,kik.zdr_sshy,kik.zdr_zy,kik.zdr_zw,kik.zdr_gznx,kik.gjr1_hyzk,kik.gjr2_hyzk,kik.gjr1_xzdz,kik.gjr2_xzdz,kik.gjr1_yzbm,kik.gjr2_yzbm, kik.gjr1_gzdw,kik.gjr2_gzdw,kik.gjr1_dwdz,kik.gjr2_dwdz,kik.gjr1_yzdrgx,kik.gjr2_yzdrgx,kik.zdr_wsdz,kik.po_wsdz,kik.gjr1_wsdz,kik.gjr2_wsdz, kik.qtlxr_c_name,kik.qtlxr_c_tel,kik.qtlxr_jdrgx,kik.qtlxr_xzdz, ki.id,ki.c_name,ki.c_tel,ki.c_cardno,ki.gems_fs_id,ki.gems_id,ki.loan_tpid, ki.loan_level,ki.c_name_mt,ki.c_tel_mt,ki.c_cardno_mt,ki.kk_kpj,ki.c_sex,ki.c_name_gj1,ki.c_name_gj2,ki.c_tel_gj1,ki.c_tel_gj2,ki.c_cardno_gj1,ki.c_cardno_gj2,ki.imgstep2_1ss,ki.id icbcid, ac.price_result,ac.source_id,ac.property_id,ac.car_status,ac.gear_box_id,ac.car_km_icbc,ac.cardt2,ac.cardt1,ac.color_id,ac.mem_states,ac.mem_citys,ac.vincode,ac.ppxh,ac.motorcode,ac.icbc_pricecs,ac.price_new,ac.c_carno, yb.id ybId,yb.`name` ybName,yvi.address address,yvi.url,yvi.server_path serverPath,yvi.id yviId,yvi.channelId, cb.name cbName,cm.name cmName,cs.name csName,ag.name agName,af.name afName from icbc_erp_video_info yvi join kj_icbc ki on yvi.ext=ki.id and yvi.id=#{0} left JOIN assess_cars ac on ki.id =ac.icbc_id left JOIN icbc_banklist yb on yb.id=ki.bank_id left JOIN car_brand cb on cb.id=ac.brid left JOIN car_model cm on cm.id=ac.carid left JOIN car_series cs on cs.id=ac.seid left JOIN assess_gems ag on ag.id=ki.gems_id left JOIN assess_fs af on af.id=ki.gems_fs_id left JOIN kjs_icbc_kk kik on ki.id=kik.icbc_id
select name from comm_states where id=4
select name from comm_citys where id=#{0}
select name from comm_zones where id=#{0}

select count(*) from ( select yvi.address,yvi.url,yvi.id yid,yvi.vid vid,iekir.result_1_code code,yvi.viedotype, fs.name, ieki.icbc_id icbcid,ieki.id iekiid,ieki.c_name cname,ieki.dt_edit editime, yb.id ybId,yb.`name` ybName from icbc_erp_video_info yvi join icbc_erp_kj_icbc ieki on yvi.ext=ieki.icbc_id and ieki.type_id=6 join assess_fs fs on ieki.gems_fs_id=fs.id
left JOIN icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir ON iekir.id=yvi.vid join kj_icbc ki on ki.id=ieki.icbc_id JOIN icbc_banklist yb on yb.id=ki.bank_id) b
select c_name,c_cardno,gems_id,gems_fs_id from kj_icbc where id=#{0}
select vincode,code from assess_cars where icbc_id=#{0}
select id from icbc_erp_kj_icbc where type_id=#{typeid} and icbc_id=#{icbcid}
mapper.update: update icbc_erp_kj_icbc set dt_edit=#{editime},status=#{status},mid_edit=#{editadmin} where type_id=#{typeid} and icbc_id=#{icbcid}
update kjs_icbc_mq set bc_status=#{bcstatus} where icbc_id=#{icbcid}
